title: Schrodinger's Mice - Interactive Data Visualization
description: An interactive data visualization that explores the circadian rhythms of mice. Generate hyponthetical mouse movement within the unobserved box to represent possible trajectories.

title: Mouse Circadian Rhythm Analysis
description: An interactive data visualization that deploys a radial graph to explore the circadian rhythms of mice, aiming to answer two key questions: What is the relationship between temperature and activity? How does gender influence this relationship?

title: Bikewatching
description: An immersive, interactive map visualization of bike traffic in the Boston area during different times of the day.

title: Amazon Product Reviews Dataset Analysis
description: We used the Amazon Product Reviews (Amazon_Fashion category) 2023 dataset to create a machine learning model to predict product rateings, using features like, review text, helpfulness votes, item descriptions.

title: Recipe Nutrition VS. Preparation Time & Steps
description: This data science project for DSC80 at UCSD investigates the correlation between a recipe's rating and the percentage of total calories in the recipe that come from sugar.

title: Entertainment Design Portfolio
description: Digital design portfolio that consists of multiple character designs, environment designs, prop designs, and transportation designs under the same fantastical world view.
